news.title: Report of FSFE's assembly during the Chaos Communication Congress

body.p: The Chaos Communication Congress is Germanyâ€™s biggest annual meetup of hackers and political activists. This year has been the 33rd edition ("33C3") and FSFE has been present with an assembly, a booth and 21 sessions about Free Software. Read a visual report of our activities along some pictures by Erik Albers.
